original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sayanagatassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
“Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: ▁na ▁ sayan a gat assa ▁a gilān assa ▁dhammaṃ ▁des essāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti
▁na ▁ sayan a gat assa ▁a gilān assa ▁dhammo ▁des etabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca antamaso chamāyampi nipannassa sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁antamaso ▁cha mā y ampi ▁nipann assa ▁ sayan a gat assa ▁a gilān assa ▁dhammaṃ ▁des eti ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
